metadata.name: Dllhost.EXE Execution Anomaly
metadata.comment: Detects a "dllhost" process spawning with no commandline arguments which is very rare to happen and could indicate process injection activity or malware mimicking similar system processes.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\dllhost.exe')) AND (lower(LOWER(process.cmd_line)) in ('dllhost\.exe', 'dllhost')) AND NOT process.cmd_line is null)

output.summary: Detects a "dllhost" process spawning with no commandline arguments which is very rare to happen and could indicate process injection activity or malware mimicking similar system processes.
